You can get to Bucerias from the airport by purchasing a taxi voucher near each exit.  

Surrounding areas such as Puerto Vallarta, Nuevo Vallarta and Sayulita will also offer taxi service to Bucerias.  Make sure you negotiate a price before you leave.

From surrounding areas, you can take any bus with Bucerias painted on the front window.  From Puerto Vallarta Centro, you must take a bus with Wal-Mart on it, then take another bus with Bucerias painted on it, which currently costs 12 pesos.  When you pass the Mega department store (on the right-hand side), you will soon need to start watching for your stop, and move toward the bus exit.
The main road between Puerto Vallarta and Tepic links most sounding areas and crosses Bucerias.

value: content=Features international artwork from established international artists, emerging local artists and showcases designer Pewter. Participates in the Thursday evening art walks.
